import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Context } from '../../context/Context'; import styles from './Profile.module.css' import axios from 'axios'; export default function Profile() { const [authorname,setAuthorname] = useState(''); const [email,setEmail] = useState(''); const [password,setPassword] = useState(''); const [error,setError] = useState(false); const [profileAvatar,setProfileAvatar] = useState(false); const [profileCover,setProfileCover] = useState(false); const {user} = useContext(Context) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setError(false) const updatedUser = { userId: user._id, username:user.username, authorname, email, password, profileCover, profileAvatar } try{ const res = await axios.put(`/users/${user._id}`, updatedUser); window.location.reload(); }catch(err){} } return (
{setProfileAvatar(e.target.files[0])}}/> {setProfileCover(e.target.files[0])}}/>
